formulas.description: Amount branch. Indicates new Sales Price of each MRR product calculated based on Default Price and price change amount converted to percentage. Used in the loop that assigns Sales Price to all MRR products.
formulas.name: num_a_NewSalesPriceMRRProduct
formulas.expression:
/* If Default Price of a product is zero, then the formula will use current Sales Price to accommodate the required price change, otherwise new Sales Price is calculated against Default Price*/
{!Update_Sales_Price_for_MRR_products.Sales_Price_ARR__c} * (100 - {!num_a_MRRPriceChangeAmountToPercentage}) / 100

formulas.description: Amount branch. Indicates new Sales Price of each One-Off product calculated based on Default Price and price change amount converted to percentage. Used in the loop that assigns Sales Price to all One-Off products.
formulas.name: num_a_NewSalesPriceOneOffProduct

formulas.description: Returns Sales Price of each selected ARR product that accommodates the new ARR entered by the user.
formulas.name: num_a_NewSalesPriceSelectedARRProducts
formulas.expression:
/* Indicates the difference between current MRR and selected MRR (ARR). After that, calculates % that the difference has from Total Sales price of selected products. After that, multiplies Sales Price of each product in the loop by the %*/
{!Apply_price_change.Sales_Price_ARR__c} * (1 - (({!rec_CurrentOpportunity.ARR_manual__c} - {!New_ARR_Price}) / {!cur_TotalSalesPriceSelectedProducts}))

formulas.description: Returns Sales Price of each selected One-Off product that accommodates the new One-Off value entered by the user.
formulas.name: num_a_NewSalesPriceSelectedOneOffProducts
formulas.expression:
/* Indicates the difference between current One-Off of opportunity and selected One-off. After that, calculates % that the difference has from Total Sales price of selected products. After that, multiplies Sales Price of each product in the loop by the %*/
{!Apply_OneOff_Price_Change.Sales_Price_ARR__c} * (1 - (({!rec_CurrentOpportunity.One_off_from_Products__c} - {!New_One_Off_Price}) / {!cur_TotalSalesPriceSelectedProducts}))

fields.name: introNewMRRDecrease
fields.fieldText:
Your new discount is {!ARR_Discount_Selected}%. With that discount, your new ARR from products will be {!num_p_scr_ARRAfterDiscountApplied}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the discount, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this discount, click "Next" to apply it to all ARR products.

fields.name: introNewMRRIncrease
fields.fieldText:
You will increase the price of ARR products by {!By_what_do_you_want_to_increase_the_price}%. With that increase, your new ARR from products will be {!num_p_scr_ARRAfterDiscountApplied}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the percentage, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this, click "Next" to apply it to all ARR products.

fields.name: introInvalidDiscount
fields.fieldText: Your discount is invalid: the price of {!Apply_price_change.Name} is too small. Please click "Finish" and check your products.

fields.name: introNewOneOff
fields.fieldText:
Your new discount is {!OneOff_Discount_Selected}%. With that discount, your new One-Off from products will be {!num_p_scr_OneOffAfterDiscountApplied}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the discount, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this discount, click "Next" to apply it to all One-off products.

fields.name: introOneOffIncrease
fields.fieldText:
You will increase the product price of One-off products by {!Percentage_OneOff_Increase_Discount}%. With that increase, your new One-Off from products will be {!num_p_scr_OneOffAfterDiscountApplied}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the percentage, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this new price, click "Next" to apply it to all One-off products.

fields.name: introNewPrice
fields.fieldText:
Your new discount is {!ALL_Discount_Selected}%. With that discount, your new Total Contract value will be {!num_p_scr_NewTotalContractValue}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

Your new ARR from products will be {!num_p_scr_NewARRAllLineItems}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}, new One-off from products will be {!num_p_scr_NewOneOffAllLineItems}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the discount, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this discount, click "Next" to apply it to all products.

fields.name: introNewPriceIncreaseAll
fields.fieldText:
Your new price will be increased by {!Percentage_Increase_All_Discount}%. With that increase your new Total Contract value will be {!num_p_scr_NewTotalContractValue}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

Your new ARR from products will be {!num_p_scr_NewARRAllLineItems}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}, new One-off from products will be {!num_p_scr_NewOneOffAllLineItems}{!txt_p_scr_CurrencySign}.

If you want to change the price, click "Previous" and update the field. If you agree with this increase, click "Next" to apply it to all products.

screens.description: This is the first screen, where users can select what kind of discount they would like to apply: amount-based or percentage-based.
screens.name: scr_Introduction
screens.label: Introduction

fields.name: introStart
fields.fieldText:
This screen sequence will assist you with changing the sales price of opportunity products.

What kind of the price change do you want to apply? You can either select the percentage (e.g. apply 15% discount to all products) or enter your new sales price and let Salesforce split it among products.

Please select below.
